name: @oai2lmapi/model-metadata
description: Shared model metadata registry for OAI2LMApi packages

scripts.build: tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const esmDir=path.join(process.cwd(),'dist','esm');const js=path.join(esmDir,'index.js');const map=path.join(esmDir,'index.js.map');if(fs.existsSync(js)){fs.renameSync(js,path.join(esmDir,'index.mjs'));}if(fs.existsSync(map)){fs.renameSync(map,path.join(esmDir,'index.mjs.map'));}"
